name: Obsidian (itch) (Apho)
description:
From beyond the edge of time and space, the Obsidian Dragon has invaded our world. It is up to our four heroines to defeat the eponymous dragon and save our world!

This is a short game with only a single boss battle lasting 5-10 minutes.

Made with RPG Maker MV for the Boss Battle Build Bout (13th September 2021 - 4th October 2021)

Credits:

Animation & Battler Graphics: KADOKAWA

Icon Graphics: Avery

Sound & Music: KADOKAWA, YouFulca

Plugins: Atreyo Ray, HimeWorks, Jeneeus Guruman, mjshi, Rocketmancer, SumRndmDde, Victor Sant, Vlue, Yanfly
